# This is an example input file for coronary BCs.
# The first line gives bc type and number of faces
# Coronary, coronary, or CORONARY can be accepted
# With this type BC, coronary and RCR BCs can be 
# used together. In this example,  faces 0 and 1 
# are coupled to coronary and RCR BCs respectively.

Coronary 2

# define face values for each face
# Coronary BC format: 
# face-id, Ra, Ca, Ra_micro, Cim, Rv, Pd, num_Pim_data, scaling_factor
# t0 P0
# t1 P1
# .....
# tn Pn
#
# Note that n=num_Pim_data and n should be greater than 2.
# For RCR, set num_Pim_data=0 and omit intramycardial
# pressures Pim. Ra, Ca and Ra_micro are used to 
# prescribe Rp, C, Rd. Cim and Rv can be any 
# non-zero values.
# face-id, Rp, C, Rd, C, Rp, Pd, 0, 1.0

0 1000 7e-05 3000 7e-5 3000 0.0 200 1.0
